title: Liquid-Cooled Chiller
description: Schema for ASHRAE 205 annex RS0001: Liquid-Cooled Chiller

description.description: Data group describing product and rating information

rating_AHRI_550_590.description: Data group containing information relevant to products rated under AHRI 550/590

rating_AHRI_551_591.description: Data group containing information relevant to products rated under AHRI 551/591

manufacturer_software_version.description: Version of the software used to generate the performance map
manufacturer_software_version.notes: Example: '15.03' If the software version does not exist, input 'NA'

model_number.notes: Pattern shall match all model numbers that can be represented by the representation

nominal_voltage.notes: Example '460' If the unit can operate at multiple voltages, the lower of the two shall be stated

nominal_frequency.notes: Example '60' or '50' Power supply frequency for the intended region of installation

tolerance_standard.description: Name and version of the testing or certification standard under which the chiller is rated

liquid_data_source.description: Source of the liquid properties data

hotgas_bypass_installed.description: Indicates if a hot-gas bypass valve is installed on the chiller

certification_reference_number.notes: The certification number as stated on the certificate.

net_refrigerating_capacity.notes: The available cooling capacity of the evaporator to the thermal load calculated using only the sensible heat transfer at full load rating condition.

input_power.description: Total unit power at design point
input_power.notes: Total power input to the chiller package.  See testing standard for details.

COP.description: Efficiency at design point as ratio of unit of cooling per unit of power consumed

part_load_value.description: Rated part load efficiency over an integrated load profile
part_load_value.notes: Represents the IPLV.IP or NPLV.IP based on the COP.

part_load_rating_points.description: The four measured data points used to calculate the part load rating value
part_load_rating_points.notes: The measured data for all 4 points used to calculate the IPLV or NPLV rating point shall be given.

full_load_evaporator_liquid_volumetric_f.description: Chilled liquid flow at the full load design point rating condition
full_load_evaporator_liquid_volumetric_f.notes: Evaporator liquid volumetric flow rate at the full load rating condition. Density calculations shall be made at the inlet temperature of the heat exchanger at full load rating condition.

full_load_evaporator_liquid_leaving_temp.description: Leaving evaporator liquid temperature at the full load design point rating condition
full_load_evaporator_liquid_leaving_temp.notes: Evaporator liquid temperature at the exit flange of the chiller’s evaporator at full load rating condition. See testing standard for details.

full_load_evaporator_liquid_entering_tem.description: Entering evaporator liquid temperature at the full load design point rating condition
full_load_evaporator_liquid_entering_tem.notes: Evaporator liquid temperature at the entry flange of the chiller’s evaporator at full load rating condition.

full_load_evaporator_liquid_differential.description: Pressure drop across the evaporator at the full load design point rating condition
full_load_evaporator_liquid_differential.notes: Pressure drop is as defined in the applicable rating standard

full_load_evaporator_fouling_factor.description: Factor of heat transfer inhibition due to heat exchanger fouling layer at the full load design point rating condition
full_load_evaporator_fouling_factor.notes: Evaporator fouling factor at which the full rating condition was measured.

full_load_condenser_liquid_volumetric_fl.description: Condenser liquid flow at the full load design point rating condition
full_load_condenser_liquid_volumetric_fl.notes: Condenser liquid volumetric flow rate at the full load rating condition. Density calculations shall be made at the inlet temperature of the heat exchanger.

full_load_condenser_liquid_entering_temp.description: Entering condenser liquid temperature at the full load design point rating condition
full_load_condenser_liquid_entering_temp.notes: Condenser liquid temperature at the entry flange of the chiller’s condenser at full load rating condition.  See testing standard for details.

full_load_condenser_liquid_leaving_tempe.description: Leaving condenser liquid temperature at the full load design point rating condition
full_load_condenser_liquid_leaving_tempe.notes: Condenser liquid temperature at the exit flange of the chiller’s condenser at full load rating condition.

full_load_condenser_liquid_dfferential_p.description: Pressure drop across the condenser at the full load design point rating condition
full_load_condenser_liquid_dfferential_p.notes: Pressure drop is as defined in the applicable rating standard

full_load_condenser_fouling_factor.description: Factor of heat transfer inhibition due to heat exchanger fouling layer at the full load design point rating condition
full_load_condenser_fouling_factor.notes: Condenser fouling factor at which the full rating condition was measured.

rating_reproducible_from_performance_dat.description: Whether this rating can be reproduced using the performance data in the representation
rating_reproducible_from_performance_dat.notes: Mark this field as true if the rating values in this table can be reproduced using the performance data in the representation within the tolerance of the rating standard.

percent_full_load_capacity.description: The percent full load cooling capacity for this data point

cooling_capacity.description: The actual cooling capacity for the data point

unit_power.description: The total unit power consumption for the data point

evaporator_liquid_entering_temperature.description: Entering evaporator liquid temperature for the data point
evaporator_liquid_entering_temperature.notes: Evaporator liquid temperature at the entry flange of the chiller’s evaporator for the part load data point

evaporator_liquid_leaving_temperature.description: Leaving evaporator liquid temperature for the data point
evaporator_liquid_leaving_temperature.notes: Evaporator liquid temperature at the exit flange of the chiller’s evaporator for the pat load data point

evaporator_liquid_volumetric_flow_rate.description: Chilled liquid flow for the data point
evaporator_liquid_volumetric_flow_rate.notes: Evaporator liquid volumetric flow rate for the part load data point. Density calculations shall be made at the inlet temperature of the heat exchanger.

evaporator_liquid_differential_pressure.description: Pressure drop across the evaporator for the data point
evaporator_liquid_differential_pressure.notes: Pressure drop is as defined in the applicable rating standard.

evaporator_fouling_factor.description: Factor of heat transfer inhibition due to heat exchanger fouling layer for the data point
evaporator_fouling_factor.notes: Evaporator fouling factor at which the part load data was measured.

condenser_liquid_entering_temperature.description: Entering condenser liquid temperature for the data point.
condenser_liquid_entering_temperature.notes: Condenser liquid temperature at the entry flange of the chiller’s condenser for the part load data point

condenser_liquid_leaving_temperature.description: Leaving condenser liquid temperature for the data point
condenser_liquid_leaving_temperature.notes: Condenser liquid temperature at the exit flange of the chiller’s condenser for the part load data point

condenser_liquid_volumetric_flow_rate.description: Condenser liquid flow for the data point.
condenser_liquid_volumetric_flow_rate.notes: Condenser liquid volumetric flow rate for the part load data point. Density calculations shall be made at the inlet temperature of the heat exchanger.

condenser_liquid_dfferential_pressure.description: Pressure drop across the condenser for the data point.
condenser_liquid_dfferential_pressure.notes: Pressure drop is as defined in the applicable rating standard.

condenser_fouling_factor.description: Factor of heat transfer inhibition due to heat exchanger fouling layer for the data point
condenser_fouling_factor.notes: Condenser fouling factor at which the part load data was measured.

certification_reference_number.notes: The certification number as stated on the certificate.

net_refrigerating_capacity.notes: The available cooling capacity of the evaporator to the thermal load calculated using only the sensible heat transfer at full load rating condition.

input_power.description: Total unit power at design point
input_power.notes: Total power input to the chiller package.  See testing standard for details.

COP.description: Efficiency at design point as ratio of unit of cooling per unit of power consumed

part_load_value.description: Rated part load efficiency over an integrated load profile

part_load_rating_points.description: The four measured data points used to calculate the part load rating value
part_load_rating_points.notes: The measured data for all 4 points used to calculate the IPLV or NPLV rating point shall be given.

full_load_evaporator_liquid_volumetric_f.description: Chilled liquid flow at the full load design point rating condition
full_load_evaporator_liquid_volumetric_f.notes: Evaporator liquid volumetric flow rate at the full load rating condition. Density calculations shall be made at the inlet temperature of the heat exchanger at full load rating condition.

full_load_evaporator_liquid_leaving_temp.description: Leaving evaporator liquid temperature at the full load design point rating condition
full_load_evaporator_liquid_leaving_temp.notes: Evaporator liquid temperature at the exit flange of the chiller’s evaporator at full load rating condition. See testing standard for details.

full_load_evaporator_liquid_entering_tem.description: Entering evaporator liquid temperature at the full load design point rating condition
full_load_evaporator_liquid_entering_tem.notes: Evaporator liquid temperature at the entry flange of the chiller’s evaporator at full load rating condition.

full_load_evaporator_liquid_differential.description: Pressure drop across the evaporator at the full load design point rating condition
full_load_evaporator_liquid_differential.notes: Pressure drop is as defined in the applicable rating standard

full_load_evaporator_fouling_factor.description: Factor of heat transfer inhibition due to heat exchanger fouling layer at the full load design point rating condition
full_load_evaporator_fouling_factor.notes: Evaporator fouling factor at which the full rating condition was measured.

full_load_condenser_liquid_volumetric_fl.description: Condenser liquid flow at the full load design point rating condition
full_load_condenser_liquid_volumetric_fl.notes: Condenser liquid volumetric flow rate at the full load rating condition. Density calculations shall be made at the inlet temperature of the heat exchanger.

full_load_condenser_liquid_entering_temp.description: Entering condenser liquid temperature at the full load design point rating condition
full_load_condenser_liquid_entering_temp.notes: Condenser liquid temperature at the entry flange of the chiller’s condenser at full load rating condition.  See testing standard for details.

full_load_condenser_liquid_leaving_tempe.description: Leaving condenser liquid temperature at the full load design point rating condition
full_load_condenser_liquid_leaving_tempe.notes: Condenser liquid temperature at the exit flange of the chiller’s condenser at full load rating condition.

full_load_condenser_liquid_dfferential_p.description: Pressure drop across the condenser at the full load design point rating condition
full_load_condenser_liquid_dfferential_p.notes: Pressure drop is as defined in the applicable rating standard

full_load_condenser_fouling_factor.description: Factor of heat transfer inhibition due to heat exchanger fouling layer at the full load design point rating condition
full_load_condenser_fouling_factor.notes: Condenser fouling factor at which the full rating condition was measured.

rating_reproducible_from_performance_dat.description: Whether this rating can be reproduced using the performance data in the representation
rating_reproducible_from_performance_dat.notes: Mark this field as true if the rating values in this table can be reproduced using the performance data in the representation within the tolerance of the rating standard.

percent_full_load_capacity.description: The percent full load cooling capacity for this data point

cooling_capacity.description: The actual cooling capacity for the data point

unit_power.description: The total unit power consumption for the data point

evaporator_liquid_entering_temperature.description: Entering evaporator liquid temperature for the data point
evaporator_liquid_entering_temperature.notes: Evaporator liquid temperature at the entry flange of the chiller’s evaporator for the part load data point

evaporator_liquid_leaving_temperature.description: Leaving evaporator liquid temperature for the data point
evaporator_liquid_leaving_temperature.notes: Evaporator liquid temperature at the exit flange of the chiller’s evaporator for the pat load data point

evaporator_liquid_volumetric_flow_rate.description: Chilled liquid flow for the data point
evaporator_liquid_volumetric_flow_rate.notes: Evaporator liquid volumetric flow rate for the part load data point. Density calculations shall be made at the inlet temperature of the heat exchanger.

evaporator_liquid_differential_pressure.description: Pressure drop across the evaporator for the data point
evaporator_liquid_differential_pressure.notes: Pressure drop is as defined in the applicable rating standard.

evaporator_fouling_factor.description: Factor of heat transfer inhibition due to heat exchanger fouling layer for the data point
evaporator_fouling_factor.notes: Evaporator fouling factor at which the part load data was measured.

condenser_liquid_entering_temperature.description: Entering condenser liquid temperature for the data point.
condenser_liquid_entering_temperature.notes: Condenser liquid temperature at the entry flange of the chiller’s condenser for the part load data point

condenser_liquid_leaving_temperature.description: Leaving condenser liquid temperature for the data point
condenser_liquid_leaving_temperature.notes: Condenser liquid temperature at the exit flange of the chiller’s condenser for the part load data point

condenser_liquid_volumetric_flow_rate.description: Condenser liquid flow for the data point.
condenser_liquid_volumetric_flow_rate.notes: Condenser liquid volumetric flow rate for the part load data point. Density calculations shall be made at the inlet temperature of the heat exchanger.

condenser_liquid_dfferential_pressure.description: Pressure drop across the condenser for the data point.
condenser_liquid_dfferential_pressure.notes: Pressure drop is as defined in the applicable rating standard.

condenser_fouling_factor.description: Factor of heat transfer inhibition due to heat exchanger fouling layer for the data point
condenser_fouling_factor.notes: Condenser fouling factor at which the part load data was measured.

evaporator_liquid_type.notes: LiquidMixture specifies liquid constituents and their concentrations, see Standard 205 Common Enumerations. Density shall be evaluated at the evaporator inlet liquid temperature.

condenser_liquid_type.notes: LiquidMixture specifies liquid constituents and their concentrations, see Standard 205 Common Enumerations. Density shall be evaluated at the condenser inlet liquid temperature.

evaporator_fouling_factor.description: Factor of heat transfer inhibition due to heat exchanger fouling layer
evaporator_fouling_factor.notes: Evaporator fouling factor at which the performance map was created. This may be different from the certification data supplied. If unknown, a value of _ can be used as a reasonable.

condenser_fouling_factor.description: Factor of heat transfer inhibition due to heat exchanger fouling layer
condenser_fouling_factor.notes: Condenser fouling factor at which the performance matrix was created. This may be different from the certification data supplied

unit_power_limit.notes: Maximum power input the chiller can operate at reliably and continuously at any condition in the operating envelope

cycling_degradation_coefficient.description: Cycling degradation coefficient (CD) as described in AHRI 550/590 or AHRI 551/591
cycling_degradation_coefficient.notes: Used for the lowest stage where the unit cycles to meet a setpoint.

performance_map_cooling.description: Data group describing cooling performance over a range of conditions

grid_variables.description: Data group defining the grid variables for cooling performance

lookup_variables.description: Data group defining the lookup variables for cooling performance

net_evaporator_capacity_fraction.description: Fraction of maximum net capacity at the same operating conditions.
net_evaporator_capacity_fraction.notes: Ratio of net_evaporator_capacity to the maximum evaporator capacity at the same operating conditions

input_power.description: Total power input to the packaged chiller
input_power.notes: All power consumed by the chiller, including controls, motors, variable speed drives, purge units, sump heaters, fans, etc.

net_evaporator_capacity.notes: The available cooling capacity of the evaporator to the thermal load calculated using only the sensible heat transfer.

net_condenser_capacity.notes: The capacity of the condenser transferred to the condenser cooling stream using only the sensible heat transfer.

oil_cooler_heat.description: Heat rejected by the chiller oil cooler (if separate stream crossing the control volume boundary)
oil_cooler_heat.notes: Heat transferred to another liquid crossing the control volume boundary from the chiller oil cooler. NULL if not present

motor_controller_heat.description: Heat rejected by the motor control center cooling (if separate stream crossing the control volume boundary)
motor_controller_heat.notes: Heat transferred to another liquid crossing the control volume boundary from the chiller motor controller (inverter drive, starter, etc). NULL if not present

grid_variables.description: Data group defining the grid variables for standby performance

lookup_variables.description: Data group defining the lookup variables for standby performance

chiller_environment_dry_bulb_temperature.description: Dry bulb temperature of the air in the environment of the chiller

input_power.description: Total power consumed by the chiller when not running. Value shall include all power sources and all auxiliary equipment provided with the chiller.
input_power.notes: Power consumed by chiller during off cycle. An example is a VSD cooling fan or sump heater.
